name: Biomni: Analyze Cell Senescence and Apoptosis
description: Analyze flow cytometry data to quantify senescent and apoptotic cell populations. Processes FCS files containing measurements for senescence-associated β-galactosidase (SA-β-Gal) and Annexin V/7-AAD staining.

fcs_file_path.description: Path to the FCS file containing flow cytometry data with measurements for senescence-associated β-galactosidase (SA-β-Gal) and Annexin V/7-AAD staining

output.description: Research log summarizing the analysis steps and results, including percentages of senescent and apoptotic cell populations

author: Biomni
